title: What is the society's approach towards mental health issues? - Quora

response.answer_text: Society’s approach to mental health issues is improving with better communication today than ever and with the realization that there are real health concerns and treatments today than ever before. People see their family members and others being diagnosed and and with the proper medications and treatment plans become productive citizens in society,they are also aware of when someone is “ off their meds” and they witness the change in the individual when they are back on their medications. Society is so much better today regarding mental health than ever before and we are no longer in the self help books section trying to self diagnose thanks to modern treatments and enlightened medical professionals.
